entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Crash when params array used with reordered attribute arguments #60572
    17.3
  • Add code refactoring to use enum name value instead of integer value #60571
  • Ensure Top level statements appear in the entry point list #60570
  • Add Tools Options Telemetry #60569
  • `[ReadOnly]Span<T>` fields and properties in a `ref struct` can have a `stackalloc` as a default value #60568
  • VS's Go To Definition disassembler handles static interface methods incorrectly #60567
  • Add telemetry for EditorConfig rules #60566
  • Incorrect define constant use in BuildServerConnection.cs #60553
  • "Inline temporary variable" introduces an unnecessary cast that's reported as nullability issue #60552
  • SARIF Error Logger - Should include the analyzers(rules) that where used #60550

Closed

  • Disable IDE0004 (Remove unnecessary cast) for explicit cast of 0 to enum type #60457
    Backlog
  • Add Correctness_Rebuild to the README badges #51246
    17.1
  • Visual Studio's undo and redo button don't work for ruleset files #1600
    Backlog
  • Add PredefinedCode{Fix,Refactor}ProviderNames to CodeAction.CustomTags to identify analyzers\fixers for telemetry #4919
    Backlog
  • Need an analyzer to catch re-used analyzer IDs #2656
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Make NotificationOption2 a serializable struct #60573
    Area-IDE
  • Global indentation options - take 2 #60565
    Area-IDE
  • handle null compilations in entry point finder #60562
    Area-IDE
  • Support built-in unsigned right shift operators. #60560
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - UnsignedRightShift
  • Colorize `async` as keyword in some cases #60558
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Remove some 'MyCodeAction's #60557
    Area-IDE
  • Fix typo in `#if` directive #60555
    Area-Compilers, Community

Merged

  • Avoid using --blame-crash with CollectDumps #60561
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Add Rebuild badge to README #60298
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Update PublishData.json for 17.3 P1 #60559
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Note auto-default merged in feature status doc #60564
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Remove unnecessary `<Compile Remove` #60538
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, Next
  • Update Roslyn.Diagnostics.Analyzers and remove RS0005 suppressions #60556
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Support parsing for Unsigned Right Shift operator #60501
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - UnsignedRightShift
  • Cleanup unused resources in Features layer #60554
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge 'main-vs-deps' into UnsignedRightShift #60551
    Area-Compilers, auto-merge
  • Use provider type name for CodeAction telemetry for code actions... #60480
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove unused abstract property `CodeFixCategory` #60536
    Area-IDE, Community, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #60574
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Implement source generator timing APIs #60267
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Remove IDynamicFileInfo-added syntax trees to attempt to improve perf #60531
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #60542
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • [semi-auto-props]: Support lambdas and local functions, eliminate duplicate code #60335
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Workspace config options #59790
    Area-IDE
  • [EE] Implement IDkmClrFullNameProvider2 in Roslyn's ResultProvider Formatter. #60522
    Area-Interactive, Community
  • Support ref field declarations from source and metadata #60416
    Area-Compilers
  • Simplifier options #60174
    Area-IDE
  • Enable null on UseExplicitTypeCodeFixProvider #58866
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main-vs-deps to main #60515
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Show linked symbol in Inheritance Margin #60225
    Area-IDE
  • Move formatting analyzer to `Analyzers` layer #60549
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #60509
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • [semi-auto-props]: Disallow 'nameof(field)' #60384
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Implement handling of rename intent #59410
    Area-IDE
  • Completion textedits cursor #60499
    Area-IDE
  • Move few `CodeFixProvider`s to Analyzers layer #60524
    Area-Analyzers, Community
